subject: p12185775
Findings: As compared to the previous radiograph, the pre-existing opacities at the right lung base have improved. The left lung base is unchanged. Overall, the signs indicative of pulmonary edema have slightly decreased in severity but they are still clearly present. Unchanged moderate cardiomegaly and left calcified lung granulomas.
